name.description: The full name of the individual.

profession.description: The professional title of the individual.

image_url.description: A URL linking to a profile image.

about.description: A short bio or description of the individual.

contact_methods.description: List of different methods to contact the individual.

detail.description: A contact detail such as a phone number or email.

social_links.description: Social media or other online profiles of the individual.

url.description: The URL of the social media or online profile.

display.description: How the URL should be displayed or labeled.

institution.description: The institution from which the degree was obtained.

timeframe.description: The timeframe during which the degree was completed.

skills.description: A list of skills possessed by the individual along with proficiency levels.

level.description: The proficiency level of the skill, often represented as a percentage.

interests.description: List of personal interests or hobbies.

name.description: The name of the interest or hobby.

profile.description: The profile information for an individual.

description: A representation of a person's professional profile including personal data, contact information, education, and skills.
